name: R.O.A.M.
description: The spirit of this app is to allow users to search for events in any particular area of the US and buy tickets. Each event will allow the user to find a weather forecast for that day. Currently, users will only be able to request events within five days of the current day.
tools: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, jQuery, OpenWeatherMap API, Ticketmaster API

name: DigiNote
description: This app allows users to create accounts and journal about media. Users can add songs, movies, and books to their notes and write down their thoughts and ideas.
tools: ReactJS, CSS Bootstrap, Express, Node, MySQL, OMDB API, Spotify API, Google Books API

name: Purrfect Cat Boarding
description: This project was completed for a previous employer that wanted their website redone. Using Wix, this site allows users to view information about the facility and email to book. Primarily a showcase of web design.

name: Zohr
description: Current contract through Teamfind, Inc. Primary responsibilities include building features and pages using Sketch mockups provided.
tools: Ruby, Ruby on Rails, ReactJS, SCSS, Bootstrap
